title: Replace UPI QR code with uploaded user image in PaywallModal

requirements.text: Save the uploaded UPI QR code image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-26 at 02.01.00.jpeg) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png, replacing any previously generated or placeholder QR code image at that path.

quotes: add this image of upi id

acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/upi-qr.png exists and contains the uploaded UPI QR code image showing 'NIDHI AESTICARE' and UPI ID: nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank.
The PaywallModal renders this image as the QR code using the path /assets/generated/upi-qr.png.
The QR code image is clearly visible and not cropped or distorted in the modal.

constraints: Do not change any functional behavior of the PaywallModal (dismissal, layout, UPI ID display, WhatsApp link).
Do not alter the UPI ID string 'nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank' displayed in the modal.
nonGoals: Changing any other UI elements in the PaywallModal.

edits: Replace the existing QR code with the user-uploaded UPI QR code image showing NIDHI AESTICARE and UPI ID nidhi.aesticare@okhdfcbank with Google Pay logo in center (upi-qr.png > upi-qr.dim_600x700.png)
